text: @realDonaldTrump @newtgingrich @foxandfriends Says the coward hiding in the basement of the white house, while 104+ thousand American lives have been lost to covid-19 and American racial injustice is on full display. Maybe if any of your 4 generations had military in it you would have a backbone and know how to respond.
